title: Tyson Fury parties in Las Vegas with Floyd Mayweather alongside Joseph Parker
text:
Tyson Fury enjoyed an evening with Floyd Mayweather in Las Vegas as the boxing duo partied the night away at a night club.

The heavyweight boxer was pictured with the undefeated welterweight former world champion at Jewel nightclub in Sin City on Wednesday as he looked to blow off steam after dipping into the world of wrestling.

Fury has agreed to face Braun Strowman at WWE Crown Jewel on October 31st in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and he had met WWE stars Roman Reigns and Ric Flair to mark his new venture earlier on.

Tyson Fury (left) poses alongside Floyd Mayweather (bottom) and Joseph Parker (third right)

The colourful 31-year-old wore an unbuttoned floral jacket as he posed for pictures with his fellow fighters.

The 6ft 9in linear world champion towered above Mayweather, who was wearing a patterned shirt and jewelry around his neck.

Right behind them was former WBO world champion Joseph Parker, who is known to have a close relationship with Fury and is based in Las Vegas for his training camps.

Fury is hoping to take on Deontay Wilder in a rematch next year after trying his hand at WWE

Fury is set to take on Deontay Wilder next year in their highly-anticipated rematch, but the American will first take on Cuban Luis Ortiz in another rematch on November 23rd after knocking out 'King Kong' in March 2018.

The Bronze Bomber also knocked Fury down in their first fight last December, although he miraculously managed to recover despite appearing unconscious to claim a draw.
description: The heavyweight boxer was pictured with the undefeated welterweight former world champion at a Jewel nightclub in Sin City on Wednesday as he looked to blow off steam.
